title: Kevin is fine
creator_credit: Gordon Glenn and The Film House
brief_description: A woman living in an isolated farm house in North Western Victoria believes her child has a learning deficiency. Her own fears and the attitude of her husband have prevented her from seeking help. Covers a series of events which lead her to take action. Cast: Nancy Black, Ross Williams.
